operation.name: login
operation.documentation: Login to the Salesforce.com SOAP Api

operation.name: describeSObject
operation.documentation: Describe an sObject

operation.name: describeSObjects
operation.documentation: Describe a number sObjects

operation.name: describeGlobal
operation.documentation: Describe the Global state

operation.name: describeDataCategoryGroups
operation.documentation: Describe all the data category groups available for a given set of types

operation.name: describeDataCategoryGroupStructures
operation.documentation: Describe the data category group structures for a given set of pair of types and data category group name

operation.name: describeLayout
operation.documentation: Describe the layout of an sObject

operation.name: describeSoftphoneLayout
operation.documentation: Describe the layout of the SoftPhone

operation.name: describeTabs
operation.documentation: Describe the tabs that appear on a users page

operation.name: create
operation.documentation: Create a set of new sObjects

operation.name: update
operation.documentation: Update a set of sObjects

operation.name: upsert
operation.documentation: Update or insert a set of sObjects based on object id

operation.name: merge
operation.documentation: Merge and update a set of sObjects based on object id

operation.name: delete
operation.documentation: Delete a set of sObjects

operation.name: undelete
operation.documentation: Undelete a set of sObjects

operation.name: emptyRecycleBin
operation.documentation: Empty a set of sObjects from the recycle bin

operation.name: retrieve
operation.documentation: Get a set of sObjects

operation.name: process
operation.documentation: Submit an entity to a workflow process or process a workitem

operation.name: convertLead
operation.documentation: convert a set of leads

operation.name: logout
operation.documentation: Logout the current user, invalidating the current session.

operation.name: invalidateSessions
operation.documentation: Logs out and invalidates session ids

operation.name: getDeleted
operation.documentation: Get the IDs for deleted sObjects

operation.name: getUpdated
operation.documentation: Get the IDs for updated sObjects

operation.name: query
operation.documentation: Create a Query Cursor

operation.name: queryAll
operation.documentation: Create a Query Cursor, including deleted sObjects

operation.name: queryMore
operation.documentation: Gets the next batch of sObjects from a query

operation.name: search
operation.documentation: Search for sObjects

operation.name: getServerTimestamp
operation.documentation: Gets server timestamp

operation.name: setPassword
operation.documentation: Set a user's password

operation.name: resetPassword
operation.documentation: Reset a user's password

operation.name: getUserInfo
operation.documentation: Returns standard information relevant to the current user

operation.name: sendEmail
operation.documentation: Send outbound email
